mapper.select: SELECT i.StoreID as StoreID, i.ReceiptID as ReceiptID, i.GoodsID as GoodsID, SUM (i.RecQty) AS qty FROM Items i right JOIN ( SELECT StoreID, ReceiptID FROM Manifest WHERE OrdDate >= #{items.OrdDate} GROUP BY StoreID, ReceiptID ) b ON b.StoreID = i.StoreID AND b.ReceiptID = i.ReceiptID where i.StoreID !='' GROUP BY i.StoreID, i.ReceiptID, i.GoodsID ORDER BY qty desc

SELECT i.StoreID, s.StoreName, i.ReceiptID, i.GoodsID, g.Name, g.KindCode, i.RecQty FROM Items i RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT m.StoreID, m.ReceiptID FROM Manifest m,Stores st WHERE m.StoreID = st.StoreID and st.Type=1 and m.RecCheckDate = #{items.date} and Amount>=0
) b ON i.StoreID = b.StoreID AND i.ReceiptID = b.ReceiptID, Stores s, Goods g WHERE s.StoreID = i.StoreID AND i.GoodsID = g.GoodsID AND i.RecQty > 0
